channel.title: Help on starting place for server
channel.description:
ok well i need some help... i wana change my area u know when a new player logs in to the server. i wanted it to be
posx = 3564 posy = 3289
any help? fast pleez :cool: :cool: :cool: :D

item.title: Help on starting place for server
item.dc:creator: @1_0wner_1 1 0wner 1
item.description:
@1_0wner_1 wrote:

OK! Go into your client.java,
Look for “home” Or whatever your command is,
you should get something like this ( THIS IS MY SERVER’S )

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = ****; teleportToY = ****; sendMessage("You teleport Back to the Abbys."); } }

now, change the “teleportToX” tp Yours, and Do the Same With “teleportToY”,
Now You Have changed the command to get to “home”

STEP 2:

Open Up You player.java, and look for thisinitial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0;
Below That You Should See something like this teleportToX = 3549;//3549; teleportToY = 3554;//3554;
Change Those Coords To Your Coords.
Now The New character Spawns there.

I hope I helped You

Read full topic
item.source: Help on starting place for server

item.title: Help on starting place for server
item.dc:creator: @walter_140 walter 140
item.description:
@walter_140 wrote:

I had the same trouble, Player.Java, then type in the old coords on Ctrl+F and look through them and you should notice them or just change everyone like i did.

Read full topic

item.title: Help on starting place for server
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

In your player.java, search for the normal coords you have so like
search
teleportToX = xxxx;

And put your X coord their, then just change it.
-Tyrael-

Read full topic
